sentence: Pic HAPPY BIRTHDAY: House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy … HHS Secretary Xavier Becerra … Rep. title: POLITICO Playbook: Ominous signs for Ukraine

sentence: But only a few days later, during a segment with Rep. Jim Jordan, Tucker voiced the same sentiment more clearly: “I think we should probably take the side of Russia,” he said, “if we have to choose between Russia and Ukraine.” Despite saying that he was "just kidding" about rooting for Russia over Ukraine, Tucker just doubled down on supporting the Russians in the conflict.
author: Tim Dickinson
title: These Are the American Right-Wingers Covering for Putin as Russia Invades Ukraine

author: Caitlin McFall
title: Ukraine invasion: Russia 'increasingly frustrated' by lack of momentum: US defense official

sentence: Lawmakers across the political spectrum support a significant boost in funding for the Ukrainian military.” Funding and arming Ukraine has widespread bipartisan support in Congress, as evidenced by the fact that Rep. KATIE PORTER (D-Calif.) and Rep. JIM JORDAN (R-Ohio) — who see eye to eye on very little, if anything — clapped about the same things they were told in a classified hearing.
title: Tell us how the Ukraine war ends
